module.name: project_management_resource_information
module.name.french: information sur les ressources de gestion de projets
module.keywords: management resource information, module, project management

change.description: Removed application module AP233 systems engineering specific detail from Annex F Application module implementation and usage guide.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the assignment of project management resource information to project management resource data.
Hyperlink to Annex F for AP233 concept model introductory material associated with project management resource information capabilities enabled within AP233.

inscope.li: facility to assign approval information to project management resource data;
facility to assign certificate information to project management resource data;
facility to assign classification information to project management resource data;
facility to assign condition and condition relationships information to project management resource data;
facility to assign contract information to project management resource data;
facility to assign date and time interval information to project management resource data;
facility to assign document information to project management resource data;
facility to assign effectivity information to project management resource data;
facility to assign file information to project management resource data;
facility to assign identification information to project management resource data;
facility to assign independent property information to project management resource data;
facility to assign justification information to project management resource data;
facility to assign location information to project management resource data;
facility to assign language information to project management resource data;
facility to assign person and organization information to project management resource data;
facility to assign product information to project management resource data;
facility to assign project information to project management resource data;
facility to assign representation information to project management resource data;
facility to assign security information to project management resource data;
facility to assign value with unit information to project management resource data.

usage_guide.p: From the perspective of information cross coupling; the type extend lists identified within this module specifiy how all project management resource information modelling concepts defined within the schemas of the project management resource information domain are coupled together via type extends within the project management resource information domain.
usage_guide.note: A large repository of information relevant to users and implementers of the STEP capabilities used in common by Ap239 and 80% of AP233 is at .
